name: MTLStoreAction
desc: Types of actions performed for an attachment at the end of a rendering pass.

items.name: case dontCare
items.desc: The GPU has permission to discard the rendered contents of the attachment at the end of the render pass, replacing them with arbitrary data.

items.name: case store
items.desc: The GPU stores the rendered contents to the texture.

items.name: case multisampleResolve
items.desc: The GPU resolves the multisampled data to one sample per pixel and stores the data to the resolve texture, discarding the multisample data afterwards.

items.name: case storeAndMultisampleResolve
items.desc: The GPU stores the multisample data to the multisample texture, resolves the data to a sample per pixel, and stores the data to the resolve texture.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The app will specify the store action when it encodes the render pass.

items.name: case customSampleDepthStore
items.desc: The GPU stores depth data in a sample-positionâ€“agnostic representation.
